channel.title: Comments on: Immersive No-HUD gameplay of vanilla Battlefield V maps and modes
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Kwindecent_exposure
item.dc:creator: Kwindecent_exposure
item.description:
After being away from these games for so long (haven't played a FPS since online in the first Modern Warfare, which turned me off - it seemed very much like what Fortnite now is. Hard pass).
This is exactly what I want to see. I've longed for a good FPS and hope for sensible strategic and action packed game play for ages.
Can you get an Owen gun?
item.content:encoded:
After being away from these games for so long (haven’t played a FPS since online in the first Modern Warfare, which turned me off – it seemed very much like what Fortnite now is. Hard pass).

This is exactly what I want to see. I’ve longed for a good FPS and hope for sensible strategic and action packed game play for ages.

Can you get an Owen gun?
